Post_Title: My 5 year old son decided to poop in the back yard like our dog.
post_text: This is what social distancing with an only child looks like right now.  I usually let him play out back for a few minutes at a time since our backyard is fenced, but I check on him often.  During a few minute stretch, he decided to pull down his pants and poop in the backyard like our dog.  He ran inside to proudly tell me what he had done.
